snippet: The new governor of Luxor, Adel Asaad Khayyat, comes from the political arm of an Islamist group that once carried out terrorist attacks.
abstract: Egyptian Pres Mohamed Morsi appoints Adel Asaad al-Khayyat as governor of Luxor, shocking many Egyptians; Khayyat comes from political arm of Islamist group that once carried out terrorist attacks that killed dozens of tourists, soldiers and police officers in Luxor.

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and MAYY EL SHEIKH

lead_paragraph: The new governor of Luxor, Adel Asaad Khayyat, comes from the political arm of an Islamist group that once carried out terrorist attacks.

headline.main: New Governor Is a Shock to Some Inside Egypt
headline.print_headline: New Governor Shock to Some Inside Egypt
